info.title: LSM - Learning Management System API
info.description: Learning Management System API It is used to create classes and mark attendance. It can also be used to attend additional classes.

get.summary: Get room equipment by room id
Get lecture and group by lecture id

post.description:
Query Example
            
    POST /Todo
    {
       "name" : "Мax",
       "surname" : "Morgan",
       "avatar" : "pathToImage/",
       "patronymic" : "___" nullable,
       "email" : "example@mail.ru",
       "telephonnumber" : "+79042391023"      
       "passwordhash" : "jhdsDHJD-12jda",
       "role" : "Student/Teacher/Admin" one of them,
       "isactive" : true/false filled in by itself, usually true,
       "createdat" : date.now() filled in by itself,        
    }

put.description:
Query Example
            
    PUT /Todo
    {
       "userid" : 4
       "name" : "Мax",
       "surname" : "Morgan",
       "avatar" : "pathToImage/",
       "patronymic" : "___" nullable,
       "email" : "example@mail.ru",
       "telephonnumber" : "+79042391023"      
       "passwordhash" : "jhdsDHJD-12jda",
       "role" : "Student/Teacher/Admin" one of them,
       "isactive" : true/false filled in by itself, usually true,
       "createdat" : date.now() filled in by itself,  
    }
